description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.hCftezts7oajma77]{Drift Crashed}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.JournalEntry.nb5A5e7HqTnvVjtX.JournalEntryPage.JE7HzZfHcSs5AOvJ]{The Drift} is full of fragments ripped from various other planes. Whether as part of a rescue team or someone lost aboard one of these floating fragments of land, you’ve gained great experience navigating through many of them. Shifting gravitational eddies and fluctuating landmasses that make some travelers seasick, feel as stable as static ground for you. While in the Drift, you can move through nonmagical difficult terrain at your normal speed. In addition, when squeezing, you aren’t considered to have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nFBcsp5FS1Wi46Fc]{Entangled} condition (although you still move at half your speed).
